    • Method Detail

      • printRegisters

        public void printRegisters()
        Prints the state of the of the CPU registers.

      • getMemory

        public int getMemory​(int index)
        Returns the contents of the memory address matching index.
        Parameters:
        index - The memory address to return the contents of.
        Returns:
        The contents of the memory address.

      • step

        public void step()
        Runs one fetch, decode, execute cycle.

      • getFullCurrentInstruction

        public int getFullCurrentInstruction()

      • printMemory

        public void printMemory()
        Prints the entire contents of the computers memory

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the internal state of computer. This includes memory and all internal registers.

      • load

        public void load​(java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> instructions)
        Loads a set of instructions into the computers memory. These can then be executed by called the step method repeatedly.
        Parameters:
        instructions - The set of instructions to be loaded.

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Sets all of the internal registers to 0 (allows program to run from beginning)

      • isHalted

        public boolean isHalted()
        Returns:

      • isFetch

        public boolean isFetch()
        Returns:
        true if computer in fetch phase false otherwise.

      • getInput

        public int getInput()
        Returns:
        The contents of the input register.

      • getOutput

        public int getOutput()
        Returns:
        The contents of the output register.

      • getAccumulator

        public int getAccumulator()
        Returns:
        The contents of the accumulator.

      • getProgramCounter

        public int getProgramCounter()
        Returns:
        The program counter value.

      • getInstructionRegister

        public int getInstructionRegister()
        Returns:
        The current instruction in the instruction register.

      • getAddressRegister

        public int getAddressRegister()

      • registerPropertyChangeListener

        public void registerPropertyChangeListener​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl)
        Register to receive notifications on the state of the computer
        Parameters:
        pcl - Listener object that wants to receive notifications

      • unregisterPropertyChangeListener

        public void unregisterPropertyChangeListener​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl)
        Unregister to receive notifications on the state of the computer
        Parameters:
        pcl - Listener object that no longer wants to receive notifications
